questions.question: What is a complex sentence?
answers: A sentence with one independent clause and one or more dependent clauses.
A sentence with only one verb.
A sentence that only uses simple words.
questions.correct: A sentence with one independent clause and one or more dependent clauses.

questions.question: Which of the following is a complex sentence?
answers: Although it was raining, we went out for a walk.
questions.correct: Although it was raining, we went out for a walk.

questions.question: What is a dependent clause?
answers: A group of words that cannot stand alone as a sentence.
questions.correct: A group of words that cannot stand alone as a sentence.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a complex sentence?
answers: Although she was tired, she finished her work.
He left early because he was sick.
After she called, I responded immediately.

questions.question: Why are complex sentences used in writing?
answers: To show relationships between ideas and add depth.
questions.correct: To show relationships between ideas and add depth.

questions.question: Which word is NOT a subordinating conjunction?
What does a complex sentence often contain?
answers: An independent clause and one or more dependent clauses.
questions.correct: An independent clause and one or more dependent clauses.

questions.question: Which of these is an example of a complex sentence?
answers: Although it was late, he finished his assignment.
questions.correct: Although it was late, he finished his assignment.

questions.question: Why are dependent clauses called 'subordinate' clauses?
answers: Because they support the main clause.
Because they have only one verb.
questions.correct: Because they support the main clause.

questions.question: Which is NOT a characteristic of a complex sentence?
answers: It has only one subject and one verb.
It may use words like 'although' or 'because'.
questions.correct: It has only one subject and one verb.

questions.question: Which is an example of a complex sentence using 'although'?
answers: Although she was tired, she went to the gym.
questions.correct: Although she was tired, she went to the gym.

questions.question: Why are complex sentences important in academic writing?
answers: They help writers express nuanced ideas.
They make texts harder to read.
They only work in spoken language.
questions.correct: They help writers express nuanced ideas.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a complex sentence feature?
answers: Adding depth to the main idea.
